name: Spring3-rest
tagline: Spring3 Rest example, demonstrating multiple representations support, custom exception handler and more
body:
Spring Rest Example
===================

##### Spring3 Rest example demonstrating

1.  Multiple representations support (JSON and XML)
2.  Custom Exception Handling
3.  Authentication with spring security
4.  Authorization with jsr 250
5.  Custom Aspect
6.  Unit Testing
7.  Codahale Metrics
8.  Spring data JPA
9.  Ehcache
10.  Dozer
11.  Yeoman Grunt bower
12.  AngularJs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
